unnormalised: Hey, sports fans! Athlete bios are my weakness! Reading about Sachin Tendulkar's journey from Shivaji Park to becoming a legend is so inspiring, no? Or Mary Kom's struggles and triumphs - truly remarkable. Remember "Chak De! India?" Similar real-life grit! I'd love to see more bios on players from smaller towns, like Patna or Lucknow. So many untold stories! What are your fave athlete biographies?
